name: OM_ag
descriptive_name: Aboveground biomass: live (Mg/ha)

name: OM_root
descriptive_name: Root biomass (Mg/ha)

name: OM_wood
descriptive_name: Dead wood (dead trees, course woody debris) (Mg/ha)

name: OM_litter
descriptive_name: Litter (Mg/ha)

name: OM_peat
descriptive_name: Peat (Mg/ha)

name: OM_SOM
descriptive_name: Potential Soil Organic Matter loss (Mg/ha)

name: fc_ag_wood_litter
descriptive_name: Fraction of combustible biomass (aboveground, wood, litter) burned

name: fc_root
descriptive_name: Fraction of root biomass burned

name: fc_peat
descriptive_name: Fraction of peat burned

name: fc_SOM
descriptive_name: Fraction of SOM burned

name: Ec_CO2
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CO2 for each unit of biomass burned (kmol/ Mg dry matter)

name: Ec_CH4
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CH4 for each unit of biomass burned (kmol/ Mg dry matter)

name: Ec_N2O
descriptive_name: Proportional release of N2O for each unit of biomass burned (kmol/ Mg dry matter)

name: k_ag_wood_litter
descriptive_name: Decay constant (k) for combustible biomass

name: k_root
descriptive_name: Decay constant (k) for roots

name: k_peat
descriptive_name: Decay constant (k) for peat

name: k_SOM
descriptive_name: Decay constant (k) for SOM

name: termite
descriptive_name: % termite mediated decomposition

name: Ed_CO2_ag_wood_litter
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CO2 for each unit of combustible biomass decomposed

name: Ed_CO2_root
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CO2 for each unit of root biomass decomposed

name: Ed_CO2_peat
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CO2 for each unit of peat biomass decomposed

name: Ed_CO2_litter
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CO2 for each unit of litter biomass decomposed

name: Ed_CH4_ag_wood_litter
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CH4 for each unit of combustible biomass decomposed

name: Ed_CH4_root
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CH4 for each unit of root biomass decomposed

name: Ed_CH4_peat
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CH4 for each unit of peat biomass decomposed

name: Ed_CH4_litter
descriptive_name: Proportional release of CH4 for each unit of litter biomass decomposed

name: Ed_N2O_ag_wood_litter
descriptive_name: Proportional release of N2O for each unit of combustible biomass decomposed

name: Ed_N2O_root
descriptive_name: Proportional release of N2O for each unit of root biomass decomposed

name: Ed_N2O_peat
descriptive_name: Proportional release of N2O for each unit of peat biomass decomposed

name: Ed_N2O_litter
descriptive_name: Proportional release of N2O for each unit of litter biomass decomposed

name: F_CO2
descriptive_name: Average annual net ecosystem-atmosphere CO2 exchange (kmol/ha/yr); + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.

name: F_CH4
descriptive_name: Average annual net ecosystem-atmosphere CH4 exchange (kmol/ha/yr); + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.

name: F_N2O
descriptive_name: Average annual net ecosystem-atmosphere N2O exchange (kmol/ha/yr); + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.

name: age_transition
descriptive_name: Age of transition (time at which biomass accumulation rate declines) (years)
category: Transition from Aggrading to 'Mature' Ecosystem (aggrading ecosystems only)

name: new_F_CO2
descriptive_name: Average annual net ecosystem-atmosphere CO2 exchange (kmol/ha/yr) after transition; + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.
category: Transition from Aggrading to 'Mature' Ecosystem (aggrading ecosystems only)

name: new_F_CH4
descriptive_name: Average annual net ecosystem-atmosphere CH4 exchange (kmol/ha/yr) after transition; + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.
category: Transition from Aggrading to 'Mature' Ecosystem (aggrading ecosystems only)

name: new_F_N2O
descriptive_name: Average annual net ecosystem-atmosphere N2O exchange (kmol/ha/yr) after transition; + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.
category: Transition from Aggrading to 'Mature' Ecosystem (aggrading ecosystems only)

name: rd
descriptive_name: Rate of disturbance events (#/year)

name: tR
descriptive_name: Time required to recover pre-disturbance biomass stocks (years)

name: FR_CO2
descriptive_name: Average annual net ecosystem-atmosphere CO2 exchange during recovery (kmol/ha/yr); + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.

name: FR_CH4
descriptive_name: Average annual net ecosystem-atmosphere CH4 exchange during recovery (kmol/ha/yr); + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.

name: FR_N2O
descriptive_name: Average annual net ecosystem-atmosphere N2O exchange during recovery (kmol/ha/yr); + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.

name: dfc_ag_wood_litter
descriptive_name: Fraction of combustible biomass (aboveground, wood, litter) burned (when disturbance is fire)

name: dfc_root
descriptive_name: Fraction of root biomass burned (when disturbance is fire)

name: dfc_peat
descriptive_name: Fraction of peat biomass burned (when disturbance is fire)

name: dk_ag_wood_litter
descriptive_name: Decay constant (k) of combustible biomass (aboveground, wood, litter) following disturbance

name: dk_root
descriptive_name: Decay constant (k) of combustible root biomass following disturbance

name: dk_peat
descriptive_name: Decay constant (k) of peat following disturbance

name: F_anth
descriptive_name: Average annual CO2 emissions associated with management (kmol/ha/yr); + indicates uptake by ecosystem, - indicates release to atmosphere.

name: bioYield_grain
descriptive_name: Grain Yield (Mg dry biomass/ha/yr)

name: bioYield_stove
descriptive_name: Residue(Stover) Yield(Mg dry biomass/ha/yr)

name: con_en_grain
descriptive_name: Corn Grain Conversion Effciency (liters ethanol / Mg dry biomass)

name: con_en_stove
descriptive_name: Corn Residue (Stover) Conversion Efficiency (liters ethanol/ Mg dry biomass)

name: ac_yield
descriptive_name: Biomass Yield (Mg dry biomass/ ha/ yr)

name: con_energy
descriptive_name: Conversion Efficiency (liters ethanol/ Mg dry biomass)

name: eth_yield
descriptive_name: Ethanol Yield (liters ethanol/ ha/ yr)

name: G_C02
descriptive_name: Displaced Gasoline CO2 Emissions (kmol C02/ ha/ yr)

descriptive_name: none

descriptive_name: none
